com.googlecode.n_orm

Annotation Type ImplicitActivation


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface ImplicitActivation
    When applied to a property whose type is a persisting class, makes the property be activated automatically after the owner persisting element is activated using PersistingElement.activateIfNotAlready(String...). When applied to a column family (i.e. properties of type Map or Set), makes it systematically be activated using PersistingElement.activate(String...). However, be careful with this annotation for all elements in the column family will be activated regardless their number. In any case, it issues the data store more requests, so it is to be used with care.
    See Also:
    PersistingElement.activate(String...)
